intent_atoms.description: Draft CLI sandbox profile guidance covering com.apple.security.files.user-selected.read-write and automation workflows for headless usage.
Guidance published in Documentation/ISOInspector.docc/Guides/CLISandboxProfileGuide.md and archived under DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/72_G3_Expose_CLI_Sandbox_Profile_Guidance/.
Execute the random slice benchmark suite on macOS hardware once Combine support is available to compare mapped vs. chunked readers under identical workloads.
Benchmark execution requires macOS runner with Combine; blocked until available.
Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS hardware with XCTest UI support to validate the end-to-end SwiftUI automation flow.
Testing requires macOS UI testing entitlements; currently blocked due to unavailable entitlements in container.
Execute the Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining throughput parity with the CLI harness.
Benchmark requires macOS runner with Xcode/Combine; blocked until available.
Reconcile CoreData session bookmark diffs with live bookmark entities when reconciliation rules are defined.
Track outcome of the notarized build Apple Events automation assessment and evaluate whether automation via Apple Events is required for notarized builds and extend entitlements safely.

functional_units.name: CLI Sandbox Profile Guidance
functional_units.description: Provides guidance for enabling filesystem access via com.apple.security.files.user-selected.read-write in CLI sandbox profiles and automation workflows for headless usage.

functional_units.name: Filesystem Access Kit Baseline Reference
functional_units.description: Reference to archived FilesystemAccessKit baseline documentation used as a foundation for sandbox profile guidance.

functional_units.name: Persistence Summary Documentation
functional_units.description: Summary of work on persisting filesystem access bookmarks, documenting persistence strategies.

functional_units.name: Random Slice Benchmark Execution
functional_units.description: Execution of random slice benchmark suite on macOS hardware to compare mapped vs. chunked readers under identical workloads.

functional_units.name: ParseTree Streaming Selection Automation Tests
functional_units.description: Runs XCTest UI tests for SwiftUI automation flow that streams parse tree selections.

functional_units.name: Combine-backed UI Benchmark Execution
functional_units.description: Executes Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining CLI harness throughput parity.

functional_units.name: CoreData Session Bookmark Reconciliation
functional_units.description: Reconciles CoreData session bookmark differences with live bookmark entities once reconciliation rules are defined.

functional_units.name: Notarized Build Apple Events Automation Assessment
functional_units.description: Tracks outcome of notarized build assessment for automation via Apple Events and extends entitlements safely.
